attributes.action: Let August 15th be a day of remembrance for all those who died or suffered in Japanese Prisoner of War Camps during WWII.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
August 15th is the day when the Far East PoWs gained their freedom and could look back, remembering their mates who died and suffered in captivity.
This day to be part of V-J Day.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Let August 15th be a day of remembrance for all those who died or suffered in Japanese Prisoner of War Camps during WWII."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15746.asp

Prime Minister's Office
